column1:
Species (Scientific Name)*

Please input the scientific name in the following format:

Genus species
column3:
Germinating Quantity

This number will be added to the “Germination/Establishment Quantity”. Enter a number, or an error will occur during upload.
column4:
Seedling Quantity

This number will be added to the "Active Growth Quantity". Enter a number, or an error will occur during upload.
column5:
Ready to Plant Quantity

This number will be added to the "Ready to Plant Quantity." Enter a number or an error will occur during upload.
column6:
Date Added*

Please enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format, or an error will occur during upload. If you don't know the exact date the inventory was added, enter a date close to when you think it was added.
column7:
Sub-Locations

If seedlings are in more than one sub-location in the nursery, enter each sub-location, separated by line breaks.
